scripts.build: cross-env GATSBY_PREFIXED_FROM_COMMAND_LINE=YES FROM_COMMAND_LINE=YES CYPRESS_SUPPORT=y NODE_OPTIONS='--require ./polyfill-node-protocol-imports.js' gatsby build
scripts.build:offline: cross-env GATSBY_PREFIXED_FROM_COMMAND_LINE=YES FROM_COMMAND_LINE=YES TEST_PLUGIN_OFFLINE=y CYPRESS_SUPPORT=y NODE_OPTIONS='--require ./polyfill-node-protocol-imports.js' gatsby build
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run start-server-and-test && npm run test-env-vars
scripts.test:offline: npm run build:offline && yarn start-server-and-test:offline && npm run test-env-vars
scripts.start-server-and-test: start-server-and-test serve http://localhost:9000 serve-static-files http://localhost:8888 combined
scripts.start-server-and-test:locally: start-server-and-test serve http://localhost:9000 serve-static-files http://localhost:8888 cy:open
scripts.start-server-and-test:offline: start-server-and-test serve http://localhost:9000 serve-static-files http://localhost:8888 cy:run:offline
scripts.cy:run: npm run cy:run:normal && npm run cy:run:bot
scripts.start-server-and-test:playwright: start-server-and-test serve http://localhost:9000 serve-static-files http://localhost:8888 playwright
scripts.start-server-and-test:playwright-debug: start-server-and-test serve http://localhost:9000 serve-static-files http://localhost:8888 playwright:debug
scripts.combined: npm run playwright && npm run cy:run && npm run test:dir-traversel-access
